SEARCH
Package game.grounds.interactable

Class ComputerTerminal

java.lang.Object
engine.GameEntity
engine.positions.Ground
game.grounds.interactable.ComputerTerminal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public class ComputerTerminal extends Ground
The ComputerTerminal class serves as hub for the player to purchase items, and allow the player to travel to different "planets" or maps.
